Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Abruptly \Ab*rupt"ly\, adv. 1. In an abrupt manner; without giving notice, or without the usual forms; suddenly. [1913 Webster]
2. Precipitously. [1913 Webster]
abruptly adv : quickly and without warning; "he stopped suddenly" [syn: {suddenly}, {short}, {dead}]
